title: E232 Paranormal Anxiety and a Seat in the Barking Room
description:
How did ghosts handle the pandemic? We tackle this tough topic and more in episode 232 as Em takes us to the Sorrel-Weed House and shares some super terrifying paranormal audio and pics. Then Christine covers the mysterious case of the disappearance of Charle's Allen, Jr. also known as Neo Babson Maximus. We also deconstruct the curse Em may or may not have on their sweatshirts... and that's why we drink!

Check out the full EVP Em talks about here (at 12:20): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BCbRtj0j4R0

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!

free shipping!
